full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 499-2 Filed 11/23/21 Page 59 of 159
LBAGmax2 Rocchio - Direct
1 Q. Who wrote this article?
2 A. Park Dietz.
3 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, we move to admit
4 Government Exhibit 5.
5 MR. PAGLIUCA: No objection.
6 THE COURT: Government Exhibit 5 is received.
7 (Government's Exhibit 5 received in evidence)
8 BY MS. POMERANTZ:
9 Q. Dr. Rocchio, did you provide the government with this article?
10 A. I did.
11 Q. Why did you provide the government with this article?
12 A. I was asked to provide examples to the government of
13 literature in the field that I thought might be helpful to the
14 court to understand the concepts that I'm talking about. This
15 does a really nice job of pointing to the part that the terms
16 grooming and seduction refer to a pattern of behavior that's
17 widely known and well established to be part of the dynamics of
18 sexual abuse. But in particular, I appreciated the author's
19 emphasis later on in the article of some of the problems with
20 the words seduction and some of the ways that much earlier
21 literature erroneously used terminology that could
22 inappropriately indicate a victim is blamed for the abuse that
23 they have been subjected to.
24 MS. POMERANTZ: Can you pull up Page 31, please.
25 
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00007927

24 MS. POMERANTZ: Can you pull up Page 31, please.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with clear and legible text. There are no visible redactions or damage.
